Sub :  Formation of Central Committee at IGI Airport Delhi. 
 
In supersession of this Bureau AVSEC Order No. 06/2008 and partial modification to 
AVSEC Order No. 05/2008 dated 31-12-2008, a Central Committee in its expanded form under 
the chairmanship of DGCA is setup at the New ATC Building, IGI Airport Delhi with immediate 
effect. There will be no Aerodrome Committee at IGI Airport Delhi. 
 
2. 
The Central Committee set up at IGI Airport will address all issues and take appropriate 
decision which will be binding on all agencies except armed intervention to terminate the hijack 
situation by NSG.  The NSG after receiving directions from the appropriate level will operate 
under their own command. 
 
3. 
For other civil airports in the country, the already existing arrangements to handle the 
hijack situation shall continue. All Aerodrome Committee of civil airports will review their SOPs 
accordingly in view of the fresh instruction regarding formation of the new Central Committee. 
The Aerodrome Committee will be in communication with the Central Committee.
